segments.text: Yeah . If you are available now , let me describe your work duties , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What am I expected to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As a newcomer , you are going to be responsible for some basic tasks first , including certain routine duties like answering the telephone and typing . Later , you will be assigned to the Sales Department .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . It must be a challenging job , but I would like to do it . And what about now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For this is your first day in our company , you can begin with our special products . Before you do your job , it's necessary for you to be familiar with our own products . Sort these papers and file them correctly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'll get to work on it at once .
segments.speaker: S1
